name: HttpDownloader
tagline: A simple http download tool written in Java Swing that support breakpoint transmission
body: httpdownloader ============== A simple http download tool written in Java Swing that support breakpoint transmission. ####How to build#### run gradle jar to generate executable JAR. or gradle distZip to generate a zip distribution. or gradle installApp to install into 'build/install'. #### Screenshots ![main](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/kwf2030/httpdownloader/master/screenshots/main.png) ![add](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/kwf2030/httpdownloader/master/screenshots/add.png)
